job.title: Data Scientist
job.description: <p>We are looking for a mission-driven team member to join our team as a data scientist. You will work directly with CTO and lead AI engineer to support the development and testing of new AI models for bias detection in text content.&nbsp; </p><p><br> </p><p>Ideal candidate should have: </p><ul><li>A degree in a quantitative field mathematics, computer science, physics, economics, engineering, statistics, operations research, quantitative social science, etc.). </li><li>Basic Knowledge on software development principles and architecture. </li><li>Good analytical and problem-solving abilities. </li><li>Ability to break down and understand complex business problems, define a solution and implement it using advanced quantitative methods. </li><li>Familiarity with programming for data analysis; ideally Python, SQL </li><li>Prior experience with text data analysis is preferred </li><li>Solid oral and written communication skills, especially around analytical concepts and methods. </li><li>Great work ethic and intellectual curiosity. </li><li>Knowledge of cloud technologies such as AWS </li><li>Work in an Agile environment. </li><li>Must be a team player with excellent communication and problem-solving skills and have experience working with customers across</li></ul>
